channel.title: Optional features on Pixelfed Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Optional features on Pixelfed Documentation

item.title: Livestreaming (Pixelfed Live)
item.description: Pixelfed Live is a mobile based livestreaming feature.

item.title: Websockets
item.description: Websockets provide real time chat for Live Streaming and in the future, other aspects of the frontend UI and mobile apps.

item.title: LDAP Authentication
item.description: You can configure your Pixelfed server to authenticate with an LDAP Server!
